What done:

  • All Biomes on Minmus, Mun transfer to Mobile Processing Lab MPL-LG-2.
  • All build on max

What none:

  • Other planer and her moon

Science Tree ALL DISCOVERED !!! 

What with other science point ?

Well if you think that grinding up all science from every biomes on Minmus and Mun is a fun way to play then I'd recommend lowering the science slider before starting a new game.

You could also use the strategies and convert science gains to isk and/or reputation.

But since it's a single player game with (almost) unlimited time acceleration the only rules that apply are your own.

Convert to funds via strategy from administration building.

 

That way you doN#t have to do contracts but get your own "budget".

Yes they can be converted to funds, this make the labs pretty profitable over time. 
Its worse in science mode.

Add mods compatible with Community Tech Tree - then use your science to continue buying technologies beyond what's in stock KSP.  Same gameplay mechanic as before, but you'll probably need to go out and get a LOT more science.
Since we're discussing a gameplay question, I moved the thread to Gameplay Questions.
Welcome to the career mode! It's research system based on science points is ridiculous, but nobody cares!

Yes, there's enough science points in the game to finish the tree several times over.

You do not "beat" or "win" in KSP.

The game is not finished when you have uncovered all tech. It's not even finished when you have visited all bodies. It's finished when you are finished with the game.

So i have to way:

  1. Transfer Science to Money
  2. Add new mods and new game
